mapper.insert: insert into user (id, u_id, user_name, phone, password, state, user_type, message_cnt, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{messageCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user set u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, message_cnt = #{messageCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, u_id, user_name, phone, password, state, user_type, message_cnt, create_time, update_time from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, u_id, user_name, phone, password, state, user_type, message_cnt, create_time, update_time from user
